error.signature: error[E0597]: borrowed value does not live long enough
error.regex: E0597.*does not live long enough|borrowed value.*dropped.*still borrowed

verdict.summary: Reference outlives the value it borrows. Value is dropped while still being referenced.

dead_ends.why_fails: 'static means lives forever — wrong for most temporary values
Creates a genuine memory leak — never do this for normal code

workarounds.action: Restructure code so the owner lives longer than the reference
Clone the data to give the consumer its own copy
Use Rc/Arc for shared ownership when multiple parts need the data
workarounds.how: Use Rc/Arc for shared ownership when multiple parts need the data

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'error[E0597]' is a lifetime_error error while 'error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
